Package logic.gameObjects

Class Hero

  • java.lang.Object
    • logic.gameObjects.Placeable
      • logic.gameObjects.Hero
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Attackable
    public class Hero
extends Placeable
implements Attackable
    Class that represents a hero in the game.
    Author:
    Luka Stoehr

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      boolean atomized
      True if this hero has been atomized by Thanos.
      int farAttackDamage
      Damage that is done in a far attack/ranged attack

      Reach of a far attack/ranged attack

      Maximum number of movement points.

      Amount of damage that is done in a near attack/melee attack

      1 or 2, depending on which player this Hero belongs to.

    • Field Detail

      • PID

        public int PID
        1 or 2, depending on which player this Hero belongs to. This is sometimes useful even if it stores the same information as Placeable.entityID

      • maxHealthPoints

        public final int maxHealthPoints
        Maximum number of health points.

      • maxMovementPoints

        public final int maxMovementPoints
        Maximum number of movement points.

        Maximum number of action points.

      • name

        public java.lang.String name
        This heroes name

      • inventory

        public java.util.LinkedList<InfinityStone> inventory
        Inventory, which contains all the InfinityStones this hero owns.

      • nearAttackDamage

        public int nearAttackDamage
        Amount of damage that is done in a near attack/melee attack

      • farAttackDamage

        public int farAttackDamage
        Damage that is done in a far attack/ranged attack

      • farAttackDistance

        public int farAttackDistance
        Reach of a far attack/ranged attack

      • atomized

        public boolean atomized
        True if this hero has been atomized by Thanos.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Hero

        public Hero​(int PID,
            int ID,
            int maxHP,
            int maxMP,
            int maxAP,
            java.lang.String name,
            int nearAttackDamage,
            int farAttackDamage,
            int farAttackDistance,
            Model model)
        Constructor for the Hero class. It fills in all the necessary attributes for when a new Hero is created at the beginning of a game.
        Parameters:
        PID - Player ID of this Hero
        ID - ID of this player
        maxHP - Maximum number of HP as specified in character configuration
        maxMP - Maximum number of MP as specified in character configuration
        maxAP - Maximum number of AP as specified in character configuration
        name - Name of this Hero
        nearAttackDamage - NearAttackDamage as specified in character configuration
        farAttackDamage - FarAttackDamage as specified in character configuration
        farAttackDistance - FarAttackDistance as specified in character configuration
        model - Model for this match.

      • reduceAP

        public boolean reduceAP​(int amount)
        Reduces the Action Points of this hero and creates an ConsumedAPEvent.
        Parameters:
        amount - Amount by which the APs are decreased
        Returns:
        True if successful

      • reduceHP

        public boolean reduceHP​(int amount)
        Reduces the Health Points of this hero and creates an TakenDamageEvent.
        Parameters:
        amount - Amount by which the HPs are decreased
        Returns:
        True if successful

      • reduceMP

        public boolean reduceMP​(int amount)
        Reduces the MovementPoints of this hero and creates an ConsumedMPEvent.
        Parameters:
        amount - Amount by which the MPs are decreased
        Returns:
        True if successful

      • heal

        public void heal()
        Restores the full HealthPoints of this character and creates an HealedEvent in the EventList

      • restoreAP

        public void restoreAP()
        Restores the action points of this character to its maximum value.

      • restoreMP

        public void restoreMP()
        Restores the movement points of this character to its maximum value.

      • infinteraction

        public boolean infinteraction​(InfinityStone stone,
                              Position position)
        Calls the infinteraction method of the InfinityStone stone, if the used stone is in the inventory of this hero.
        Parameters:
        stone - Used InfinityStone
        position - Some Infinteraction need a (target) Position, depending on the used InfinityStone.
        Returns:
        Whether the infinteraction was successful.

      • giveInfinityStone

        public boolean giveInfinityStone​(Hero hero,
                                 int stoneID)
        Gives a certain InfinityStone to another hero, if the stone currently is in the inventory of this hero.
        Parameters:
        hero - Hero the stone is given to.
        stoneID - StoneID of the stone that is transferred.
        Returns:
        True if transfer was successful.

      • nearAttack

        public boolean nearAttack​(Position position)
        Attacks an Attackable on a neighbouring field
        Parameters:
        position - Target position.
        Returns:
        Whether the attack was successful.

      • farAttack

        public boolean farAttack​(Position position)
        Method for a farAttack. You can attack a Hero that is within line of sight, but not on a neighbouring field.
        Parameters:
        position - Target Position
        Returns:
        Whether the attack was successful

      • hashCode

        public int hashCode()
        Creates a unique hash Code
        Overrides:
        hashCode in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        Hash code for this object

      • attacked

        public int attacked​(int damage)
        Called if this Hero is attacked. Reduces the HealthPoints of this Hero.
        Specified by:
        attacked in interface Attackable
        Parameters:
        damage - How much damage the attack theoretically causes.
        Returns:
        The damage that was actually done.

      • move

        public boolean move​(Position newPosition)
        This method moves a hero on the field. If the target field is occupied by another hero or thanos, places are swapped. If there is an InfinityStone, it is collected.
        Specified by:
        move in class Placeable
        Parameters:
        newPosition - where the object is moved to, must be a neighbouring field
        Returns:
        Whether the hero was moved.

      • toIngameCharackter

        public InGameCharacter toIngameCharackter()
        Converts this Hero to a Charackter, which is send over the network during the IngamePhase.
        Returns:
        Charackter

      • toConfigHero

        public ConfigHero toConfigHero()
        Method to create a ConfigHero object out of the Hero
        Returns:
        ConfigHero Object that was created out of a Hero

      • inventoryToArray

        public int[] inventoryToArray()
        Returns the inventory of this Hero as an int array containing the IDs of the Stones that this hero carries.
        Returns:
        int[] containing the IDs of the InfinityStones in the inventory

      • equals

        public boolean equals​(java.lang.Object o)
        Indicates whether some other object is "equal to" this one. An Hero is equal to an other Hero if the following attributes are equal * PID * ID * healthPoints * movementPoints * actionPoints * maxHealthPoints * nearAttackDamage * farAttackDamage * farAttackDistance * atomized * name * inventory
        Overrides:
        equals in class java.lang.Object
        Parameters:
        o - the object to be compared with a for equality
        Returns:
        whether the object is equal to the calling Hero or not.
